EmailTemplate.subject: See you tomorrow at the Pivotal Big Data Roadshow Workshop - DC
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
Thank you for signing up to attend the Pivotal Big Data Roadshow Workshop coming up tomorrow in Washington, DC. We look forward to seeing you!
Please bring your laptop and power cord to fully participate in this hands-on workshop. A Mac or Linux environment is ideal. For the best workshop experience, please prep your laptop prior to attending following the “Workshop Prerequisites” listed below.
Pivotal Big Data Roadshow Tuesday, April 21st, 2015 8:30am - 3:30pm (breakfast & lunch provided) Workshop Agenda <https://pivotal.io/big-data/data-roadshow/dc>
Sheraton Tysons Hotel 861 Leesburg Pike Tysons, Virginia 22182 Maps & Directions <http://www.sheratontysonscorner.com/things-to-do-in-tysons-corner-va>
Parking Information Complimentary self-parking is available at the workshop venue.
WORKSHOP PREREQUISITES All Hands-on Section
- VMware Player. Suggestions: VMware Player (Windows) OR VMware Fusion (MacOS). - RDP Client. Suggestions: coRD (MacOS), rDesktop (linux), Microsoft RDP (Windows)
*Access to VM instance will be provided
QUESTIONS?
Contact Kim Marie Ruquet at kruquet@pivotal.io <mailto:kruquet@pivotal.io> or via cell at (631) 388-0569.
We look forward to seeing you! The Pivotal Team
P.S.- Only a few spots remain! If you have a colleague interested in attending please forward on this link to the workshop details & registration <https://pivotal.io/big-data/data-roadshow/dc>
